S08n686:1: atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tasminneva parṣatsannipāte sannipatitaḥ sanniṣaṇṇo'bhūt |
S08n686:2: utthāyāsanāt sarvabuddhaṃ praṇamya parṣanmaṇḍalamadhye sthitvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya caraṇayornipatya sa yena vajrapāṇiḥ mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ tena vyavalokya vācamudīrayati sma |
S08n686:3: atikrūrastvaṃ vajrapāṇeḥ yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sattvopaghātikaṃ kāmopasaṃhitaṃ ca mantratantrāṃ bhāṣayase |
S08n686:4: na khalu bho jinaputra ! bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣa dharmaḥ |
S08n686:5: mahākaruṇāprabhāvitā hi mahābodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ carante sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitādhyāśayena pratipannā bhavabandhanānna mucyante |
S08n686:7: sattvopaghātikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ tathāgatārhantaḥ samyak sambuddhāḥ sarvasattvānuddiśya bhāṣante mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatatvāt |
S08n686:9: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śāntamatiṃ bodhisattvamāmantrayate sma |
S08n686:12: yathā tvaṃ vadasi yathā tvaṃ prakāśayasi |
S08n686:23: acintyā hi śāntamate ! bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ caryāniṣpanditasattvadhātunirhāram |
S08n686:24: evaṃ hi śāntamate ! bodhisattvena mantrajāpinā cittamutpādayitavyam |
S08n686:28: mā nāmāyaṃ sattvo trayāṇāṃ bodhīnāmabhavyo bhavet |
S08n686:29: evaṃ hi śāntamate ! bodhisattvena mantrajāpinā cittamupasthāpya upāyakauśalyaṃ cābhicārukaṃ ca karma prayoktavyam |
S08n686:33: api ca bho jinaputra ! dharmādharmaśubhāśubhaṃ kuśalākuśalagatimāhātmyasattvopāyavinayanirahāratāṃ dharmadhātunirahāratāṃ ca pratipapadyante buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarva eva dharmadeśanāsattvopāyapāyakāṃ ca pratipadyante |
S08n686:35: yaduta tvavinayanāya sattvapākānuśāsanāya ca tatrabhavanto jinaputrāḥ yo'yaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamahāsamayopaviṣṭāḥ tatra sarvaiḥ samagraiḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ ya eva kuśalākuśalagaveṣaṇairbhavitavyam |
S08n686:37: atha śāntamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vajrapāṇiṃ yakṣasenāpatiṃ vyavalokya tṛṣṇāmbhūtaḥ svake āsane niṣaṇṇo'bhūt |
S08n686:38: acintyā buddhadharmā iti manasikṛtya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ ||
S08n686:39: atha vajrapāṇirguhyakādhipatiḥ sarvaṃ tat parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhūyaḥ krodharājasya kalpaṃ bhāṣate sma |
S08n686:40: śṛṇvantu bhavanto devasaṅghāḥ ye sattvadhātunisṛtāśca sarve bhūtagaṇāḥ ādau tāvat kṛtarakṣaḥ taṃ paṭaṃ krodharājasya parigṛhya viveke sthāne sattvā ekaliṅge maheśvarasyāyatane taṃ liṅgaṃ viparudhirarājikākāñjikenābhyajya picumardapatrairarcayitvā mānuṣāntranālibhi ātmanā yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣaśirakapālena dakṣiṇahastena saprahāro bhūtvā vāmahastena liṅgaṃ tarjayamānaḥ paramakrodhābhibhūtaḥ avamānitaduṣṭarājānaiḥ mahāparibhavagatamānasaḥ anyairvā dhūrtapuruṣaiḥ mahāyakṣairmahādhanairmahāpracaṇḍaiḥ mahānāyakaiḥ śuddhāraṃ pithayitvā nagnako muktaśikhaḥ maheśvaraliṅgaṃ vāmapādenākramya krodhamantraṃ tāvajjapet yāvanmaheśvaraliṅgo madhye sphuṭita iti dvividalībhūtaṃ mahāṃśca huṅkāraḥ śrūyate |
S08n686:42: tadeho eva duṣṭarājñaḥ anyo vā yaḥkaścinmahāyakṣaḥ aristatkṣaṇādeva jvareṇa gṛhyate |
S08n686:44: tatraiva muhūrtaṃ japed yāvat kṣaṇādeva śatrorjīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ bhavati |
S08n686:47: madhyāhne tathaiva maheśvarāyatanaṃ gatvā nimbapatrairabhyarcya mahāmāṃsadhūpaṃ dattvā mantraṃ japet |
S08n686:50: yadi jāpaṃ na tyajate kruddho vā dakṣiṇamūrtaistiṣṭhate sa śatrurmṛyate gotrotsādo bhavati |
S08n686:52: bhūyo liṅgamudakena prakṣālya suśītalena kṣīreṇa snāpayet |
S08n686:56: maheśvaraliṅgasya dakṣiṇāmūrttau madanakaṇṭakakaṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vaikaṅkatasamidhānāṃ viṣarudhirarājikābhyaktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n686:59: dvitīye divase mahājvareṇa mahāśūlena vā gṛhyante vividhairvā rogaiḥ amānuṣairvā māraṇāntikaiḥ |
S08n686:60: tṛtīye divase tṛbhiḥ sandhyaiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitaṃ tyajante |
S08n686:64: evaṃ sarvadevānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yo yasya devatābhaktaḥ tamākramya kuryāt |
S08n686:65: tasya nakṣatramantrasaṃjñatāṃ pādenākramya vāmena karma kuryāt |
S08n686:67: sarveṣāṃ ca pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ vāmena gṛhītvā karma kuryānna cākrameṇāpi calaṃyeyetkadā sarvalaukikamantrāścākramya kuryāt |
S08n686:68: asiddha eva krodharājā jāpamātreṇaiva karmāṇi karoti sarvamantrāṃ vināśayati sarvaśatrūṃ ghātayati sarvayantrāṃ pātayati |
S08n686:69: saṃkṣepato yathā yathā prayujyate sarvalaukikalokottaramantravidhānenāpi tat sarvaṃ karoti |
S08n686:73: manasecchayā śatruṃ ghātayati mahāśūlamudrayā saṃyuktaḥ sarvakarmāṇi karoti ||
S08n686:75: madhyāhne śmaśānaṃ citāvekarātroṣitaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śmaśānakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya viṣarudhirāktāṃ rājikāṃ juhuyāt |
S08n686:80: tato muhūrtamātreṇa yojanasahasramapi gatvā śatruṃ ghātayanti kulānutsādayanti |
S08n686:83: viveke śucau deśe śucivastraprāvṛtena śūnyagṛhaṃ praviśya karpāsāsthyāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt tato taṃ bhasma ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ gṛhya śucau vastrakhaṇḍe badhnīyā pṛthak pṛthak |
S08n686:84: dvau poṅgalikāṃ kṛtvā śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya mahākṛtarakṣāścātmano dravyaṃ ca gṛhamapraviśya mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā rātrau kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ vā citau sthitvā dakṣiṇābhimukhaḥ śarāvasampuṭaṃ gṛhītvā sthitako nagnako muktaśikhaḥ sa kruddho nirbhayo bhūtvā vidyā daśasahasrāṇi japet |
S08n686:86: tad bhasma yadi kaścidamānuṣo dravyaṃ prārthayate na dātavyam |
S08n686:87: haṭhaṃ karoti krodharājaṃ smṛtvā huṅkāraḥ prayoktavyaḥ |
S08n686:92: prabhāte sūryodaye snātvā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena svagṛhaṃ praveṣṭavyam |
S08n686:94: tato yo dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena manuṣyādvipadacatuṣpadāṃ sarvaprāṇibhūtāṃ sadevanāgayakṣāṃ mūrdhnā tāḍayed vaśā bhavanti |
S08n686:95: yad vāmena hastena gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena sarveṣāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ strīṇāṃ mūrdhnā tāḍayed vaśyā bhavanti |
S08n686:96: dakṣiṇena yad gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena manuṣyāṇāṃ nābhideśe tāḍayet |
S08n686:99: grāmyadharmaniṣeviṇo yasyā striyāyāṃ abhiśakto bhavati tasyāṅgajāte guhyapradeśe bhasmanāvacūrṇayet |
S08n686:101: naṣṭavraṇā bhavati yāvantaṃ tadeva puruṣaṃ prāpnuyāt |
S08n686:108: tasya tadaṅgajātaṃ yāvad dātravaśāt tasyaiva tat punaḥ prādurbhavati |
S08n686:109: striyasya vā puruṣaya vā yena vā tad bhasma punardattaṃ bhavati tasya vaśena varttati vā na vartati vā yatheṣṭaṃ vā taṃ karoti |
S08n686:110: yadi balāt kurvanti yeṣāṃ tu tad dattaṃ teṣāṃ guhyapradeśāni krimayaḥ prādurbhavante |
S08n686:112: māsābhyantareṇa pūtikā vā bhavanti durgandhakuṇapasadṛśāḥ mahāpradararogādibhiḥ puruṣavyādhibhiḥ puruṣā gṛhyante |
S08n686:117: spṛṣṭamātro yadi na prāpnoti sparśanaṃ darśanapathe sthitā adarśane vā anuvāte ca bhasmamutsṛjet |
S08n686:118: yathā tasya bhasmanā īṣidavadhūlitaḥ manasā ca cintayitvā dātā bhasmamutsṛjet |
S08n686:119: yat tena cintitaṃ bhavati tat sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti |
S08n686:120: parahastena vātmanā vā yathābhilaṣitaṃ tat sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti |
S08n686:122: atha śayanāsanādīnāṃ astaraṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ vividhāni vālaṅkaraṇaviśeṣāṇi nānāvastrāṇi vā vāhanayānopānahacchatrādīnāṃ sarvāṇyupakaraṇaviśeṣāṇi bhojanapānabhakṣaṇādīnāṃ sarvāṇi śarīropayojyāni bhāṇḍopakaraṇāni puṣpantāmbūlaphalagandhadhūpādīnāṃ sarveṣutaistaṃ bhasmanāvacūrṇayet |
S08n686:131: yaṣṭīmadhuṃ nīlotpalaṃ śvetacandanaṃ caikīkṛtya śītalenāmbhasa pīṣayitvā taccharīraṃ mrakṣayet mūrdhnā prabhṛti yāvat pādatalam āryamañjuśriyamūlamantraṃ japatā |
S08n686:134: strīṇāmanuvātaṃ gatvā yatrepsatā sarvaduṣṭaḍākinistrīṇāṃ garvitānāṃ ca prayoktavyaṃ nānyeṣām |
S08n686:137: puruṣasyāpi puruṣendriyaṃ śmaśruromāṇi ca stanāni ca prādurbhavante ||
S08n686:140: yatra vā prītirutpadyate tena vā kārāpayati |
S08n686:142: yatra vā cittasya nirvṛttirutpadyate tasya tad bhasmāṃ datvā yatheṣṭaṃ kārāpayati |
S08n686:145: manasā cintayitvā mūrdhni sparśanānmastakaśūlaḥ mukhasparśanānmukhapākaḥ evamanūpūrvyā yāvaddhṛdayaṃ hṛcchūlakukṣiśūlaṃ vā upajāyate |
S08n686:147: saṃkṣepato mārayati śoṣayati pācayati ākarṣayati vaśayati yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā tat sarvaṃ karoti |
S08n686:148: copaghātikaṃ ākarṣaṇavaśīkaraṇaṃ ca sudūre'pi sthitaḥ karmāṇi karoti |
S08n686:152: ubhau pāṇigṛhītaṃ prākāraṃ pratolī aṭṭālāṃśca prapatante |
S08n686:163: ātmano mahārakṣā ye ca svasenāyāṃ vā sakhāyānāṃ |
S08n686:168: naṭī naṭa tathā bhaṭṭa revatī cāpi viśrutā |
S08n686:169: tamasurī tha lokā mekhalā cāpi sumekhalā ||
S08n686:171: naṭikāyā mantraḥ - om naṭi mahānaṭi āgacchāgaccha divyarūpiṇi svāhā |
S08n686:172: asyopacāraḥ - phalake paṭṭake vā abhilikhya māṃsāhāreṇa vā kṣīrāhāreṇa vā vidyā aṣṭasahasraṃ japtavyā |
S08n686:173: ālekhyā ca sarvālaṅkārabhūṣaṇī śyāmāvadātā vṛkṣāśṛtā ekavastrā muktakeśā,
S08n686:174: saṃraktanayanā īṣismitamukhā sādhakaṃ tarjāyamānā dakṣiṇahastena vāmena pāṇinā vṛkṣaśākhāmavalagnā sarvāṅgaśobhanā vicitrapaṭṭanivastā |
S08n686:175: tasyeva krodharājasya paṭasyāgrataḥ unmanā uttarāmukhaṃ sthitvā palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya gugguluguṭikānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ yāvat sapta divasāni |
S08n686:176: tataḥ saptame divase udārāṃ baliṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca prajvālya mantraṃ japatā tāvat tiṣṭhet yāvadardharātram |
S08n686:177: tataḥ sā yakṣiṇī svayameva mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā svarūpeṇāgacchati |
S08n686:180: tataḥ sādhakena vaktavyam - bhāryā me bhavasva iti |
S08n686:186: yadi nāgacchati dvitīye vāre krodharājasahitaṃ japenniyatamāgacchati |
S08n686:188: naṭṭāyā mantraḥ – om naṭṭe śuklāmbaramālyadhāriṇi maithunapriye svāhā |
S08n686:190: bhaṭṭāyā mantraḥ - om bhaṭṭe bhaṭṭe ālokini kiṃ cirāyasi ehyehi āgacchāgaccha mama kāryaṃ kuru svāhā |
S08n686:192: śiraḥsthāne maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gugguludhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāmaṣṭasahasraṃ japet |
S08n686:193: mauninā ekākinā śucinā dvāraṃ pidhāya māsena rātrau niyatāmāgacchati |
S08n686:194: āgatā ca kāmayitavyā bhāryā bhavati sarvakāmadā |
S08n686:208: kāmadā bhogadā nityaṃ varadāṃ tāṃ mabhinirdiśet ||
S08n686:209: pūrvavat paṭamabhilikhya etasyā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - raktapaṭṭanivastā raktapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyā raktāvabhāsā ca varṇataḥ |
S08n686:210: mekhalāyāḥ mantraḥ - om mekhale mahāyakṣiṇi mama kāryaṃ sampādaya svāhā ||
S08n686:211: sumekhalāyā mantraḥ - om mekhale sumekhale mahāyakṣiṇi sarvārthasādhani om samayamanusmara svāhā ||
S08n686:212: ālokinyā mantraḥ - om lokini lokavati svāhā |
S08n686:214: tamasundaryāyā mantraḥ - om ghuṇu guhyake ghuṇu ghuṇu guhye ehyehi guhyake svāhā |
S08n686:216: etāyā paṭavidhāno'sti ādau tāvat śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena pūrṇamāsyāṃ vivikte sthāne dvāraṃ pidhāyitvā andhakāre ālokavarjite vidyāṃ daśasahasrāṇi japet |
S08n686:219: pūrvamāsyādārabhya yāvadaparā pūrṇamāsī atrāntare karma bhavati |
S08n686:220: rātrau śayanakāle śayyāmārūḍhaḥ pracchanne guptapradeśe ekākinā dvāraṃ pidhayitvā saṅkucitakarṇikāṃ vānapuṣpaṃ ca kaṭutailena miśrayitvā hastau pādau prakṣālayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumaṣṭaśatābhimantṛtaṃ kṛtvā svapet monī |
S08n686:228: divyaṃ cāsya sukhasaṃsparśam adarśanenaiva sarvakāryāṇi sampādayati |
S08n686:240: dine dine ekaikāṃ yakṣiṇīṃ kṣaviṭiṃ preṣayati |
S08n686:241: siddhā satī sarvasādhakānāṃ anekamantraparivārāṃ ca sarvayakṣīṇāṃ ca maharddhikā ttamāvṛtā |
S08n686:249: paryaṭanti imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtsnāṃ caiva medinīm |
S08n686:254: na tāsāṃ kiñci duḥsādhyaṃ sarvakarmakarāḥ śubhāḥ ||
S08n686:256: guhyavāsinyā mantraḥ - om guhile guhamati guhavāsi ānaya bhagavati mayāntikaṃ samayamanusmara svāhā |
S08n686:257: khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya pṛyaṅgupuṣpāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ māsamekam |
S08n686:260: phalake vā paṭṭake vā kuḍyāyāṃ vā aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ navabhājanakūrcakaiḥ |
S08n686:261: ādau tāvat parvatarājā sumerurlikhāpayitavyaḥ caturasraḥ catuḥśṛṅgocchṛtaḥ saptaparvatapaṅktipariveṣṭitaḥ |
S08n686:263: tatrasthā divyarūpiṇī sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā ekākinī yakṣiṇī guhavāsinī nāma likhāpayitavyā paṭṭavastranivastā paṭṭāṃśukottarīyā kanakavarṇā vicitracārurūpī taṃ tādṛśaṃ paṭamabhilekhya śucau pradeśe śucinā kṣīrāhāreṇa vidyāṃ daśasahasrāṇi japet |
S08n686:264: mahāpūjāṃ kṛtvā yathāśaktito vā tato japānte mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā divyarūpī yakṣiṇī svayamevāgacchati |
S08n686:266: tataḥ sā bravīti - vatsa kiṃ karttavyam |
S08n686:271: āryā sā maharddhikā ca kāma prārthayati na siddhyate |
S08n686:285: asyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vigatārcidhūmavigataiḥ aṅgāraiḥ dakṣiṇahastatale manacchilayā pratikṛtimabhilikhya nāma ca puruṣasya striyā vāmahastatale tatraivāṅgārarāśau tāpayet mantraṃ japatā |
S08n686:290: tathaiva etasyā patamabhilikhya varjayitvā guhālayaṃ aśokavṛkṣāśṛtā likhāpayitavyā |
S08n686:291: etasyāḥ ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - sarvaṃ tathaiva karma yathā guhavāsinyā |
S08n686:294: candragrahe suvarṇagairikāṃ bhūrjapatreṇa veṣṭayitvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvaccandro mukta iti |
S08n686:295: tataḥ suvarṇagairikayā yasyā nāma likhati striyasya vā āyojanaśatāsthitā apyānayati |
S08n686:303: kumārī ardhabarbarāśirā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā ekavastrā dakṣiṇahastena bījapūrṇāvasaktaphalā vāmahastenāśokavṛkṣaśākhāvalagnā |
S08n686:306: śvetacandanena ca maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā trisandhyaṃ jātīkusumairabhyavakīrya gugguludhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāmaṣṭasahasrakam japet yāvanmāsamekam |
S08n686:307: tato pūrṇamāsyāṃ jātīkusumaiḥ mahatī pūjāṃ kārayitvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca nivedyāṃśca datvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena rātrau tāvajjaped yāvat svarūpeṇaiva kumārī pañcaśataparivārā vaiśravaṇasya duhitṛ āgacchati |
S08n686:310: tataḥ sādhakena vaktavyam - trayāṇāṃ vārāṇāmanyatamamekaṃ varaṃ prārthayitavyā |
S08n686:316: sā ca mātā pañcaśataparivārasya bhaktācchādanamalaṅkaraṇaviśeṣāṇi ca sarvatra cintitamātreṇaiva sampādayati |
S08n686:328: asyā mupacāraḥ - śvetacandanena dakṣiṇāṃ bāhumupalipya vāsataḥ kuṅkumera sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā rātrau ekākinā mauninā pracchanne pradeśe dvāraṃ pidhāya pañcāṣṭau vibhītakaphalāni tilataile prakṣipya pathet |
S08n686:329: taṃ tailaṃ gṛhītvā vidhītakaphalāṃ parityajya nave māṇḍe sauvarṇe rājate tāmre mṛnmaye vā sthāpya pādānte śayyāyāṃ sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā anenaiva mantreṇa ekākṣarayakṣiṇyā andhakāre vivikte śayane puṣpābhikīrṇe svaptavyam |
S08n686:337: tataḥ sā divyarūpī abhinavabadhvā vayātsamānā paricārikaiḥ parivāritā pradīpahastā svaprabhodyotitālokā śayanāsanaparigṛhītā vicitrābharaṇojjvalā āgatya ca mantrāpayate |
S08n686:338: kāmabhogopakaraṇaparigṛhītā āgatya ca sādhakaṃ kaṇṭhe paripvajate |
S08n686:340: āgatā ca kāmayitavyā rātrau paricarya prabhāte'ntardhīyate |
S08n686:341: śayyāyāṃ muktāhāraṃ tyajya suvarṇasahasramūlyaṃ dine dine parityajya gacchati ca |
S08n686:343: yadi kiñcit sthāpayati bhūyo na bhavati |
S08n686:347: māraṇāntaṃ paramaguhyakā hyete paramagopyā na dvitīyasattvamārocanaṃ kṣamante |
S08n686:351: sarvaguhyakānāṃ sarvayakṣiṇīnāṃ ca eṣa eva vidhānā |
S08n686:354: anyastrīmaithunābhigamanaṃ ca bhāryāyā ca varjayet sadā ||
S08n686:355: manojñāyā mantraḥ - om manohare madonmādakari vicitrarūpiṇi maithunāpreye svāhā |
S08n686:356: asyāmupacāraḥ - udyānavāṭikāyāṃ aśokavṛkṣasyādhastāt savibhaktāṃ kuṭiṃ kārayitvā aguptatarāṃ kṛtakavāṭārgalaprākārocchritāṃ śucinā lakṣamekaṃ japet |
S08n686:358: mahāvasāṃ saṅgṛhya śmaśānavoṭakena vartiṃ kṛtvā dvāraṃ pighayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālayet |
S08n686:359: sadaśaṃ ca vastraṃ keśāpagataṃ bahirdvāra sthāpayet |
S08n686:360: pratyagraṃ rātrau sā nagnikāgatya taṃ vastraṃ nivāsya praviśate mānuṣastrīrūpiṇī bhūtvā |
S08n686:361: tataḥ sādhakaḥ tena sārdhaṃ ramate yāvat pradīpaṃ jvalate |
S08n686:363: tasmiṃ vastre suvarṇamekaṃ baddhvā vastraṃ parityajyaśayyāyāmapakramati |
S08n686:366: atha kaṇṭhā divyamuktāhārāṃ atha bāhāt kaṭakaṃ kaṭyāṃ mekhalāṃ padbhyāṃ nūpuraṃ śīrṣe maṇiṃ evamanyatarānyataraṃdivyamābharaṇamekaṃ yatra yatra gṛhyate tatra tatrānuprayacchati |
S08n686:371: nityasthā rasāyanaṃ prayacchati yaṃ pītvā dīrghakālaṃ jīvati |
S08n686:376: om mahānagni nagnije svāhā tenaiva dīpaṃ prajvālya anena mantreṇāṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā kārayet |
S08n686:379: uddhṛte dīpe nirvṛte cāntardhānaṃ kīlakaṃ mānuṣaṃ vasākīlaṃ ca so śṛṅge gavalamahiṣaśṛṅge vā śmaśāne cailavartinā voḍhavyam |
S08n686:386: yatra bābhirucitaṃ yatra vā sthāne gupte karoti |
S08n686:390: anyastrīdarśanābhirucitaṃ manasepsitaṃ tadānurūpī tasyopasaṅkramato hyapūrvasya sādhakavaśāditi ||
S08n686:392: asyāmupacāraḥ - khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n686:393: trisandhyaṃ māsamekaṃ śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ śucinā śucau deśe mantraṃ tāvajjapedrahasi yāvadardharātre niyatamāgacchati |
S08n686:394: tato mātā bhaginī bhāryā yathaiva pūrvaṃ tata sarvaṃ karoti sarvaṃ ca vistarato vaktavyam ||
S08n686:396: paryaṭanti mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ trailokyaṃ ca surāsuram ||
S08n686:405: yathā saṅgraharāgaṃ ca nibandhyaṃ ceha bāliśām |
S08n686:408: mantrairākṛṣya bhuñjīta yakṣīṃ vā atha rākṣasī ||
S08n686:409: nāgī ca matha gandharvī daityayoṣimatha kinnarīm |
S08n686:412: tatra gatvā vaset kalpa mantrajño mantrajāpinaḥ ||
S08n686:413: maitreyo nāma sambuddhaḥ yadā buddho bhaviṣyati |
S08n686:414: tadāsau śroṣyati saddharmaṃ śrutvā mukto bhaviṣyati ||
S08n686:427: sidhyante tasya mantrā vai ye viraktā tu kāmataḥ |
S08n686:431: na siddhirlabhyane mantrāṃ teṣu sevī sadāśucī |
S08n686:434: padmoccā samodā ca ajitā cāpi jayā sadā ||
S08n686:437: asyāḥ kalpaḥ - gaṅgākūle samudrataṭe vā udyānapuṣpavāṭikāyāṃ madhye uḍayaṃ kṛtvā śucitaraṃ ātmanā ca śucirbhūtvā śilāpaṭṭakākāraṃ mṛṇmaye kṛtvā tatraiva rātrau dvāraṃ pidhayitvā sarvakāmabhogyādyupakaraṇānyupahṛtya tatraivātmasamīpe yakṣiṇyāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayet |
S08n686:441: divyaṃ ca muktāhāraṃ śayyāṃ parityajya prabhāte gacchati |
S08n686:442: evaṃ yāvad dinedine ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ nityasthā bhavati |
S08n686:445: dīnāralakṣamūlyaṃ tat hāraṃ maṇiratnopaśobhitaṃ ṣaṭbhirmāsairatikrāntaiḥ nityasthā bhavati bhāryā sarvakāmadā |
S08n686:446: yathā rūpamabhilaṣitaṃ tathā rūpaṃ kṛtvāṃ upatiṣṭhate |
S08n686:448: sādhakasyecchayā sarveṣāṃ yakṣīṇāmayaṃ vidhānaḥ yathā nirdiṣṭānāṃ atra anyatra ||
S08n686:449: jayāya mantraḥ - om jaye ! sujaye ! jāpayati sarvakāryāṇi kuru me svāhā |
S08n686:451: sarvāṅgaśobhanā devī bhomya ca subhagā śubhā ||
S08n686:457: tato mahāraṇyaṃ praviśya phalāhāraḥ tāvajjapedyāvat svarūpeṇopatiṣṭhate |
S08n686:467: atha bhāryā bhavati svabhavanaṃ nayate divyavimānābhirūḍho tayā sārdhaṃ ramate |
S08n686:472: asyāḥ kalpaḥ - ardharātre aparimāṇo jāpaḥ kartavyaḥ |
S08n686:477: ātmanā ca saṅkośaṃ dīrghakālaṃ ca jīvāpayati ||
S08n686:479: evaṃ piśācāḥ piśācamaharddhikāḥ nāgakanyāḥ asurakanyāḥ apsarā surayoṣid daityakanyā |
S08n686:480: evaṃ vidyādharīṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ mānuṣīṇāmamānuṣīṇāṃ ca mantrāṇi bhavanti |
S08n686:481: asaṅkhyeyāni tathaiva yakṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ṛṣīṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ asurāṇāṃ pretānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca mahābrahmaṇaḥ maheśvarasya mahāviṣṇoḥ mātarāṇāṃ aindrāṇi cāmuṇḍivārāhipramukhānāṃ mantrāṇi bhavanti pṛthakpṛthak sarve ca samaye ākṛṣṭāḥ iha krodharājena yamāntakena ānītā grastā samaye sthāpitā mañjughoṣasyopanāmitā anuparivārā anupūrvasthitā paricārikā sarveṣāṃ saṃkṣepataḥ yatra pratimā svayaṃ vā pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā krodharājānaṃ yamāntakaṃ tāvajjapedyāvat pratibimbaṃ prakampya pracalate prasvidyati vā |
S08n686:484: evaṃ yāpi tāḥ catuḥkumāryaḥ mahāyakṣiṇyaḥ bhrātuḥ tumburusametā divyarūpiṇyaḥ amburāśisamāśritāḥ nauyānasamārūḍhāḥ sarvalo(ka)
S08n686:485: supūjitā sattvānugrahakārikāḥ teṣāmapyeṣa eva vidhiḥ | yaduta
S08n686:489: teṣāṃ pracchannataḥ sthāpya krodhaṃ jāpya samārabhet ||
S08n686:490: calaḥ kampaḥ tathā svedaḥ jāyateṣu ca sarvataḥ |
S08n686:491: tataḥ siddhā iti jñātvā mantrajāpī japaṃ tyajet ||
S08n686:493: sarvathā sādhakā te vai bhavante ha sajāpine ||
S08n686:499: te tu sarve prayoktavyā sakalpā kalpavistarāḥ ||
S08n686:502: sarve te krodharājasya niyuktā te prakāśitā |
S08n686:503: āryā ye ca mantrā vai viśiṣṭā sarvatogatāḥ ||
S08n686:505: tathā mantradhare mantrā mayā caiva prabhāṣitā ||
S08n686:506: ye cānye mantramukhyāstu kuleṣveva hi pañcasu |
S08n686:512: tārāṃ ca bhṛkuṭī caiva tathā paṇḍaravāsinīm |
S08n686:515: sarvāṃ tathāgatiṃ vidyāṃ mañjughoṣaṃ ca dhīmatam ||
S08n686:516: mahāsthāmaṃ samantaṃ ca tathā padmavaraṃ prabhum |
S08n686:519: vajrasenaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca matsutāṃ cāpi dhīmatām ||
S08n686:520: mayā ye bhāṣitā mantrā nāvajñāṃ kārayejjapī |
S08n686:522: na japī yojayet tatra krodharājaṃ supūjitam |
S08n686:523: vidyācchedaṃ na kurvīta teṣu mantreṣu sarvadā ||
S08n686:526: yathā tantreṣu mantrāṇāṃ sarveṣveva tathā kṛtā |
S08n686:527: sarvaṃ ca sarvato mantrāṃ sarvaṃ caiva samārabhet ||
S08n686:529: eṣa mantro mahākrodhaḥ yamānto nāma nāmataḥ ||
S08n686:537: mantraṃ ca kāśrito vajrī mantraṃ bhāṣe maharddhikam ||
S08n686:538: śṛṇvantu sarve sattvā vai sarvabhūtagaṇāḥ śubhāḥ |
S08n686:543: ahaṃ ca bhāṣahe hyatra parṣanmadhye sudāruṇam ||
S08n686:545: namaḥ pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ namo bodhisattvānāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhiteśvarāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām |
S08n686:546: tadyathā - om kha kha khāhi khāhi duṣṭasattvadamaka asimusalapāśaparaśuhasta caturbhuja caturmukha ṣaṭcaraṇa gaccha gaccha mahāvighnaghātaka vikṛtānana sarvabhūtabhayaṅkara aṭṭahāsanādine vyāghracarmanivasana kuru kuru sarvakarmāṃ cchinda cchinda sarvamantrāṃ ākarṣākarṣaya sarvabhūtāṃ nirmatha nirmatha sarvaduṣṭāṃ praveśaya praveśaya maṇḍalamadhye vaivasvatajīvitāntakara kuru kuru mama kāryaṃ daha daha paca paca mā vilamba mā vilamba samayamanusmara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ sphoṭaya sphoṭaya sarvāśāpāripūraka he bhagavaṃ kiṃ cirāyasi mama sarvārthaṃ sādhaya svāhā ||
S08n686:547: eṣa saḥ mārṣāḥ sarvadevagaṇāḥ yamāntako nāma krodharājā yamarājānamapyānayati ghātayati śoṣayati pācayati damayati |
S08n686:548: evaṃ sarvamantrāṃ sarvadevāṃ kiṃ punarmānuṣaṃ prati duḥkhitam |
S08n686:553: sarvamantrāṇā yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā karoti |
S08n686:554: paṭhitasiddha eṣa krodharājā yamāntako nāma parisamāpta iti ||
S08n686:555: āyamañjuśrīmūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt pañcāśatimaḥ yamāntakakrodharājāsarvavidhiniyamaḥ tṛtīyaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti ||
